Content: If one side is clearly superior to another no simulation should occur
and the weaker side just be obliberated while the stronger one takes

some random damages. This is intended to reduce overhead.
It is
relevant that high stealth targets should have a chance to slip away
instead and the minor force is still permitted to do the damage it
might have done under advantageous circumstances (so 1 full round of
damage (The superior side should eliminate the inferior one multiple
times with its damage in the first round)).
